privates.name: Mississippi River Bridge Company
privates.description: Can be pruchased by a company with home token adjancent to East/Plains border in Phase Two. Until this corperation is closed/purchased, no track may be laid to cross the Mississippi River. Purchasing company may bridge river once at $40 discount (unless home is adjacent border, than free extra tile lay to bridge river

privates.name: The Southern Cattle Company
privates.description: This company has a token that may be placed on any city with a cattle symbol. Increases value of city by $10 for owning corperation.

privates.name: Grace Mountain Lumber Company
privates.description: This company has a token that may be placed on any city with a tree symbol. Increases value of city by $10 for owning corperation.

privates.name: Colorado Engineers
privates.description: Recieves one Engineer marker. Other four can be purchaseed by other corperations for $50. Engineer markers allow for half price mountin builds in Plains or West Zones.

privates.name: Gold Eagle Mining
privates.description: $20/$10 marker can be place in any city with a gold symbol. This marker increases the value of that city by $20 for owning corperation and $10 for other corperations. By closing this private, replace the marker with the $20 marker, and only benfits the owning corperation.

privates.name: Central Pacific
privates.description: Once purchased, the owning company recieves one marker. Others may be purchased from the company for $25. Companies owning a marker gain one extra plains tile laying point.

privates.name: Denver-Grand Junction
privates.description: Comes with a share of the Denver & Rio Grand Western. Blocks tile placement in the D&RGW hex until purchased/closed.

privates.name: The Southern Pacific Railroad
privates.description: Comes with director's cert of the Southern Pacific. Purchaser must set par price of SP. Closed when SP buys a train. Blocks tile placement in the SP hex until closed.

privates.name: Schuylkill Valley
privates.description: Blocks tile placement on SV hex until purchased/closed.

privates.name: Keystone Tunnel
privates.description: May be purchased by a company with home token in East for $0 in Phase Two. Owning corperation may lay one mountain tile in the east zone at a $60 discount which closes the company.

privates.name: Azure Fisheries
privates.description: This company has a token that may be placed on any city with a fish symbol. Increases value of city by $10 for owning corperation.

privates.name: Appalachian Coal Mining
privates.description: This company has a token that may be placed on any city with a coal symbol. Increases value of city by $10 for owning corperation.

privates.name: The Gulf Shipping Company
privates.description: $20/$10 marker can be place in any city with a port symbol. This marker increases the value of that city by $20 for owning corperation and $10 for other corperations. By closing this private, replace the marker with the $20 marker, and only benfits the owning corperation.

privates.name: Mohawk & Hudson
privates.description: May be exchanged for a share of the New York Central. If owned by the NYC, may be exchanged for a share of the NYC as a corperation redemption.

privates.name: Camden & Amboy
privates.description: Comes with a share of the Pennsylvania. Blocks tile placement in the C&A hex until purchased/closed.

privates.name: The Southern Railroad
privates.description: Comes with a share of the Southern. Blocks tile placement in the Southern (Atlanta) hex until purchased/closed.

privates.name: Baltimore & Ohio
privates.description: Comes with director's cert of the B&O. Purchaser must set par price of B&O. Closed when B&O buys a train. Blocks tile placement in the B&O hex until closed.

notes.note: Shares in the market pay dividends to the corporation
No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
Shares cannot be sold during the first stock round

turns.name: Operating Round
steps: Lay two yellow or one upgrade tile

legend.description: Shares of this corporation do not count toward the certificate limit
Players may purchase any number of shares of this corporation from the open market in one stock action
